## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPRMT3, PRMT3</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA PROTEIN ARGININE METHYLTRANSFERASE 3, protein arginine methyltransferase 3
- **Description:**   protein arginine methyltransferase 3;(source:Araport11)
